posts.author: LtFlowbee
posts.content:
Hi all,  I'm looking for a cleric build that can tank, heal, and buff.  As far as combat more melee focused than ranged.  Really your classic battle cleric I suppose.  The one minor catch is I want to plan Lawful Good or Neutral Good.

1) PvM or PvP - PvM
2) Level cap - 40
3) Race preference - Prefer human, but flexible
4) Class preference - Base class cleric, but can multi into others.
5) Melee preference - Hammer and Shield
6) Range preference - No preference
7) Weapon preference - War hammer preferred, but any "clericy" weapon will do (mace, etc)
8) Maximum item enhancement - Pretty much vanilla NWN stuff
9) Spellcasting - buffs, heals and a few combat spells
10) Custom factors - N/A- Vanilla NWN

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Here's a Cleric 32 / Fighter 8 that seems to fit the bill. If you do not have permanent Haste items available, you might be wise to replace the Healing domain with Travel to get Haste as an available buffing spell. Trickery is there to give you Improved Invisibility, a very nice buff.
INT is 13 to qualify for Improved Knockdown, and STR needed to start odd in order to end even. It would have been nice to have 12 DEX for more AC (drink a Cat's Grace potion to fix that), more INT for more skills, like a maxed Heal skill, and more CHA for better turning, but you can't have everything. There is always a trade-off to make.
